changes_summary: These commits primarily focus on checkout flow improvements, cart service migration, and pet subscription management features. Major work includes implementing reactivation pricing, cancellation reason tracking, cart-service backwards compatibility, and various UI enhancements for multi-pet checkout and promotional banners. Several refactoring efforts and E2E test additions are also present.

features.name: Cancellation Reason Deceased Hook
features.description: Created useIsCancellationReasonDeceased hook to track when pet cancellation reason is deceased

features.name: Dashboard Banner for No Subscriptions
features.description: Added banner display on dashboard when user has no active subscriptions

features.name: Charge on Checkout
features.description: Enabled charging functionality during checkout process

features.name: Reactivation Pricing Hook
features.description: Created useReactivationPricing hook to handle pricing logic for subscription reactivation

features.name: Gift Redirection
features.description: Added redirection logic for gift-related flows

features.name: Free Addon Persistence
features.description: Persist free addon selections post checkout when selected from free cuts popup on payment page

features.name: MSS Cart Price Endpoint
features.description: Enabled MSS Cart price endpoint for PetsTable EditMenuAddons screen

features.name: Checkout Event Attributes
features.description: Added attributes into checkout events for better tracking

features.name: Multi-Pet Checkout Animation
features.description: Updated animation text for multi-pet checkout flow

features.name: Explore Store CTA Redirection
features.description: Updated redirection logic for explore the store call-to-action

features.name: Price with Discount Display
features.description: Updated price display to show discounted pricing

decisions.rationale: Ensure smooth transition during cart-service migration by maintaining backwards compatibility
Enable monitoring and debugging during cart-service migration

decisions.what: Remove static cadence with translation keys
decisions.rationale: Support internationalization for cadence removal feature

refactors.reason: Standardize testing approach with new quiz step methods

fixes.issue: Selected state styles in Promotional Multi SKU banner

entities.name: cart-service
entities.context: Migration with backwards compatibility and tracing implementation

entities.name: MSS Cart
entities.context: Price endpoint enabled for PetsTable EditMenuAddons screen

entities.name: PetsTable EditMenuAddons
entities.context: Now uses MSS Cart price endpoint

entities.name: Dashboard
entities.context: Added banner for no subscriptions state

entities.name: Checkout
entities.context: Multiple enhancements including charge enablement, event attributes, and multi-pet animations

entities.name: Reactivation
entities.context: Added pricing hook and E2E tests for free popup

key_patterns: Custom React hooks for business logic encapsulation (useIsCancellationReasonDeceased, useReactivationPricing)
Progressive migration strategy with backwards compatibility for cart-service
Feature flag pattern for gradual rollout (charge on checkout enablement)
E2E test coverage expansion for critical flows (reactivation, meal selection)
